name: RaKoval~Nya: Escape Edition
description:
Our whole life is an RKN, and you are in it - Telegram. In this war, only the strongest will survive, who will be able to bypass all blockades and invasions of enemies. You do not have to face the enemy face to face, but what you do will cause considerable damage to the scoundrel. In the end, you will receive something more than a reward. Namely - freedom, because for her lack of all other things become unnecessary. So in the way! Break through to freedom and show your enemies who you are!
You have to fly a plane of freedom and try not to get locked. Try not to bump into the obstacles on the way to get to the coveted goal - freedom. You also have:

- Endless gameplay
- nice graphics
- musical accompaniment
- freedom!
